item.title: [HELP] Coding Problem, [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Hero317 Hero317
item.description:
@Hero317 wrote:

hey guys, well im coding my 508, and i have an idea, of what i wanna do for a custom emote. like i can add custom emotes fine and all, BUT. say if so the “hail” command were it gets all players around you to do an emote/talk, well. i’ve managed to also do that, BUT i want the person doing the emote to do a tottally different emote, so as like. the player is doing like a sick emote, while the players around are cheering ect, how could i do that? i’ve managed to TRY, keyword ‘TRY’ to put this code together, i get no compiling erors but it just doesnt work:S

P.S i tried putting it into 1 full code but that didnt work eathe, but here is my result:

[code] } else if (buttonId == 19) {
for (Player pl : Server.engine.players) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.requestAnim(862, 0);
pl.requestForceChat(“Chug Chug Chug!”);
} else if (pl != p) {
break;
}

         } if (buttonId == 19) {
	        p.requestForceChat("*Gulp Gulp Gulp*");
            p.requestAnim(1330, 0);
		p.runEmote = 2769;
		p.walkEmote = 2769;
		p.standEmote = 2770;
		p.runEnergy = 99999999;
		p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
		p.updateReq = true;

}[/code]

If someone could help em that would be amazing i am also looking for a coder to code on my team, PM me if ur interested

Read full topic
